texts.biography: Ogma is master of the rune of inspiration. Musician and storyteller Ogma would be a conventional bard if he had not given up worldly amenities to devote himself exclusively to life in the most beautiful and remote corners of the forest.
texts.name: Ogma

specialty.description: Morale bonus and enchants units with morale. Start with sorrow.
